data.title: Web Design & Digital Media
data.meta_description: Multimedia artists design computer-delivered electronic systems that allow the user to control, combine, and manipulate different types of media, such as text, sound, video, computer graphics, and animation. data.meta_site_name: College Majors 101 - Discover College Majors, Jobs and College Offerings
data.text:
Multimedia artists design computer-delivered electronic systems that allow the user to control, combine, and manipulate different types of media, such as text, sound, video, computer graphics, and animation. The most common multimedia machine consists of a personal computer with a sound card, modem, digital speaker unit, and CD-ROM. Interactive multimedia systems under commercial development include cable television services...

"The Bachelor of Arts in Multimedia Studies is a comprehensive curriculum that includes courses in film studies, television studies, journalism, video production, computer animation, and studies and practices in multimedia, interactive media, and new technologies. Participating faculty are engaged with analyzing the power and responsibility of existing and emerging media from formal, historical, economic, and ideological perspectives."

(Provided By: Florida Atlantic University)

"Students concentrate their studies in emphasis areas of web design, front-end coding (HTML/CSS/Javascript), interactive media, and computer programming. This unique interdisciplinary program incorporates coursework from the Computer Science, Art + Design, and Communication departments."

(Provided By: Clarke University)

"If you know what HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, User Experience, UI/UX, PHP, SQL, Design Thinking, SEO and CMS mean, you may be a perfect fit for UTA's Communication Technology program, where students learn to analyze, design and apply technological solutions to today's "one-click" communication needs."

(Provided By: The University of Texas - Arlington)

"The creative industries are an important part of New Orleans culture and its economy. The Digital Media Practices Major gives students the opportunity to develop and refine their skills in digital media as they relate to the creative industries. Students pursue fundamental coursework in content creation, storytelling, and media manipulation before choosing from one of five focus areas for a year-long senior Capstone project."

(Provided By: Tulane University)

"You’re surfing the web and using apps every day. You’ve got ideas, and you’re anxious to share them with the world. Here’s your chance. Edinboro’s new Computer Science track in Web and Mobile App Development prepares you to jump into an industry that is exploding with job opportunities."

(Provided By: Edinboro University of Pennsylvania)

"Throughout the program, students are challenged to develop design solutions in the areas of package design, publication design, web and app design, interactive communication, and advertising, as well as the creation of graphic identities and brand systems."

(Provided By: Massachusetts College of Art and Design)

"The Applied Design and Visual Communication degree at Houghton College is an art and communication partnership that will give you a foundation for various art, design, media production and communication careers. Courses in graphic design, video and photography complement study in art history and media studies."

(Provided By: Houghton College)
